description: Chad Knight is freakin' out about gettin' hitched. He needs to relax and get over his pre-wedding jitters. Luckily hunky chauffeur Jeff Hammond arrives to give him a hand ... and whatever else needed to help the nervous groom out. Eagerly sucking Jeff's cock seems to be doing the trick until Chad yields and Jeff takes control with a wide-stretching ass pounding that leaves Chad calm and satisfied.
title: Driving Hard
